content: Despite @jenlampton's efforts to notify the curator of Backdrop's new release, we still didn't make it into the latest edition of the PHPWeekly newsletter: http://www.phpweekly.com/archive/2021-01-21.html
Note however that Drupal's birthday was mentioned in there, as were new releases of Joomla and Laravel :sad:
I even replied directly to the email pointing out that Backdrop was excluded :( (after I had previously asked for it to be included)
@BWPanda maybe you can email Katie for the next one?
@jenlampton Sure, just add my name to the list to remind me when the time comes.

BWPanda said:

Despite jenlampton's efforts to notify the curator of Backdrop's new release, we still didn't make it into the latest edition of the PHPWeekly newsletter: http://www.phpweekly.com/archive/2021-01-21.html

katie replied and said she would try to get Backdrop into this week's newsletter :)
